miseq_libraries.generate_excel.commandLine:
mkdir data
DATA_DIR=$(realpath data)

for FILE in /global/cscratch1/sd/jaws_jtm/jaws-prod/cromwell-executions/miseq_libraries/5c7ca4aa-6bc2-4f90-a80c-6232ee64e1f0/call-generate_excel/inputs/2127969419/HHCHN_length_distribution.csv /global/cscratch1/sd/jaws_jtm/jaws-prod/cromwell-executions/miseq_libraries/5c7ca4aa-6bc2-4f90-a80c-6232ee64e1f0/call-generate_excel/inputs/2127969419/HHCHO_length_distribution.csv
do
    cp $FILE data
done

for FILE in /global/cscratch1/sd/jaws_jtm/jaws-prod/cromwell-executions/miseq_libraries/5c7ca4aa-6bc2-4f90-a80c-6232ee64e1f0/call-generate_excel/inputs/-336626956/HHCHN_stats.csv /global/cscratch1/sd/jaws_jtm/jaws-prod/cromwell-executions/miseq_libraries/5c7ca4aa-6bc2-4f90-a80c-6232ee64e1f0/call-generate_excel/inputs/-336626956/HHCHO_stats.csv
do
    cp $FILE data
done

python /usr/src/python/grna_analysis/generate_excel.py -n "BEEPS_ESE-jaws_02" -d "$DATA_DIR"

miseq_libraries.generate_html.commandLine:
mkdir -p summary/"BEEPS_ESE-jaws_02"
HTML_DIR=$(realpath summary/"BEEPS_ESE-jaws_02")

mkdir data
DATA_DIR=$(realpath data)

for FILE in /global/cscratch1/sd/jaws_jtm/jaws-prod/cromwell-executions/miseq_libraries/5c7ca4aa-6bc2-4f90-a80c-6232ee64e1f0/call-generate_html/inputs/1341417849/HHCHN_length_distribution.png /global/cscratch1/sd/jaws_jtm/jaws-prod/cromwell-executions/miseq_libraries/5c7ca4aa-6bc2-4f90-a80c-6232ee64e1f0/call-generate_html/inputs/1341417849/HHCHN_spacers_distribution.png /global/cscratch1/sd/jaws_jtm/jaws-prod/cromwell-executions/miseq_libraries/5c7ca4aa-6bc2-4f90-a80c-6232ee64e1f0/call-generate_html/inputs/1341417849/HHCHO_length_distribution.png /global/cscratch1/sd/jaws_jtm/jaws-prod/cromwell-executions/miseq_libraries/5c7ca4aa-6bc2-4f90-a80c-6232ee64e1f0/call-generate_html/inputs/1341417849/HHCHO_spacers_distribution.png
do
    cp $FILE data
done

for FILE in /global/cscratch1/sd/jaws_jtm/jaws-prod/cromwell-executions/miseq_libraries/5c7ca4aa-6bc2-4f90-a80c-6232ee64e1f0/call-generate_html/inputs/2127969419/HHCHN_length_distribution.csv /global/cscratch1/sd/jaws_jtm/jaws-prod/cromwell-executions/miseq_libraries/5c7ca4aa-6bc2-4f90-a80c-6232ee64e1f0/call-generate_html/inputs/2127969419/HHCHO_length_distribution.csv
do
    cp $FILE data
done

for FILE in /global/cscratch1/sd/jaws_jtm/jaws-prod/cromwell-executions/miseq_libraries/5c7ca4aa-6bc2-4f90-a80c-6232ee64e1f0/call-generate_html/inputs/-336626956/HHCHN_stats.csv /global/cscratch1/sd/jaws_jtm/jaws-prod/cromwell-executions/miseq_libraries/5c7ca4aa-6bc2-4f90-a80c-6232ee64e1f0/call-generate_html/inputs/-336626956/HHCHO_stats.csv
do
    cp $FILE data
done

cd "$HTML_DIR"  # generate index.html here

if [ -r "/global/cscratch1/sd/jaws_jtm/jaws-prod/cromwell-executions/miseq_libraries/5c7ca4aa-6bc2-4f90-a80c-6232ee64e1f0/call-generate_html/inputs/1763430452/BEEPS_ESE-jaws_02.xlsx" ]
then
    python /usr/src/python/grna_analysis/generate_html.py -n BEEPS_ESE-jaws_02 -d "$DATA_DIR" -e "/global/cscratch1/sd/jaws_jtm/jaws-prod/cromwell-executions/miseq_libraries/5c7ca4aa-6bc2-4f90-a80c-6232ee64e1f0/call-generate_html/inputs/1763430452/BEEPS_ESE-jaws_02.xlsx"
else
    python /usr/src/python/grna_analysis/generate_html.py -n BEEPS_ESE-jaws_02 -d "$DATA_DIR"
fi

# zip up the HTML dir
cd .. # cd to summary dir
tar -czvf "BEEPS_ESE-jaws_02".tar.gz "BEEPS_ESE-jaws_02"

miseq_library.bbduk.commandLine:
READS_WITH_5_PRIME_FLANK=reads_with_5_prime_flank.fastq
READS_WITH_BOTH_FLANKS=reads_with_both_flanks.fastq

READS_WITH_5_PRIME_FLANK_TRIMMED=reads_with_5_prime_flank_trimmed.fastq
READS_WITH_BOTH_FLANKS_TRIMMED=reads_with_both_flanks_trimmed.fastq
READS_WITH_SPACERS_FASTQ=reads_with_spacers.fastq

TRIMMED_READS=trimmed_reads.fastq

# link out_* files produced by earlier tasks into current directory
for FILE in /global/cscratch1/sd/jaws_jtm/jaws-prod/cromwell-executions/miseq_libraries/5c7ca4aa-6bc2-4f90-a80c-6232ee64e1f0/call-miseq_library/shard-0/miseq_library.miseq_library/2fb7bb1a-3dce-4f93-82c2-c956d2c27a57/call-bbduk/inputs/1130845429/out_five_prime_flank.fq /global/cscratch1/sd/jaws_jtm/jaws-prod/cromwell-executions/miseq_libraries/5c7ca4aa-6bc2-4f90-a80c-6232ee64e1f0/call-miseq_library/shard-0/miseq_library.miseq_library/2fb7bb1a-3dce-4f93-82c2-c956d2c27a57/call-bbduk/inputs/1130845429/out_five_prime_revcomp_flank.fq /global/cscratch1/sd/jaws_jtm/jaws-prod/cromwell-executions/miseq_libraries/5c7ca4aa-6bc2-4f90-a80c-6232ee64e1f0/call-miseq_library/shard-0/miseq_library.miseq_library/2fb7bb1a-3dce-4f93-82c2-c956d2c27a57/call-bbduk/inputs/1130845429/out_three_prime_flank.fq
do
    echo linking $FILE
    ln -s $FILE .
done


### cleanup

## reads w/ forward-oriented flanks
if [ -f ./out_three_prime_flank.fq ]
then
    bbduk.sh in=./out_three_prime_flank.fq out=./five_prime_forward_trim.fq ktrim=l k=15 mm=f ref=/global/cscratch1/sd/jaws_jtm/jaws-prod/cromwell-executions/miseq_libraries/5c7ca4aa-6bc2-4f90-a80c-6232ee64e1f0/call-miseq_library/shard-0/miseq_library.miseq_library/2fb7bb1a-3dce-4f93-82c2-c956d2c27a57/call-bbduk/inputs/-249615313/five_prime_flank.fasta #-Xmx23g
    bbduk.sh in=./five_prime_forward_trim.fq out=./both_forward_trim.fq ktrim=r k=15 mm=f ref=/global/cscratch1/sd/jaws_jtm/jaws-prod/cromwell-executions/miseq_libraries/5c7ca4aa-6bc2-4f90-a80c-6232ee64e1f0/call-miseq_library/shard-0/miseq_library.miseq_library/2fb7bb1a-3dce-4f93-82c2-c956d2c27a57/call-bbduk/inputs/-507780751/three_prime_flank.fasta #-Xmx23g

    cat ./both_forward_trim.fq > $TRIMMED_READS
fi

## reads w/ reverse complemented flanks
if [ -f ./out_three_prime_flank_revcomp.fq ]
then
    bbduk.sh in=./out_three_prime_flank_revcomp.fq out=./five_prime_revcomp_trim.fq ktrim=r k=15 mm=f ref=/global/cscratch1/sd/jaws_jtm/jaws-prod/cromwell-executions/miseq_libraries/5c7ca4aa-6bc2-4f90-a80c-6232ee64e1f0/call-miseq_library/shard-0/miseq_library.miseq_library/2fb7bb1a-3dce-4f93-82c2-c956d2c27a57/call-bbduk/inputs/-249615313/five_prime_revcomp_flank.fasta #-Xmx23g
    bbduk.sh in=./five_prime_revcomp_trim.fq out=./both_revcomp_trim.fq ktrim=l k=15 mm=f ref=/global/cscratch1/sd/jaws_jtm/jaws-prod/cromwell-executions/miseq_libraries/5c7ca4aa-6bc2-4f90-a80c-6232ee64e1f0/call-miseq_library/shard-0/miseq_library.miseq_library/2fb7bb1a-3dce-4f93-82c2-c956d2c27a57/call-bbduk/inputs/-507780751/three_prime_revcomp_flank.fasta #-Xmx23g

    cat ./both_revcomp_trim.fq >> $TRIMMED_READS
fi

if [ -f $TRIMMED_READS ]
then
    echo trimmed reads
    head -10 $TRIMMED_READS
    ## calculate the # of trimmed reads that are 20bp long
    bbduk.sh in=$TRIMMED_READS lhist=HHCHN_length_distribution.csv out=$READS_WITH_SPACERS_FASTQ minlen=160 maxlen=160 int=f #-Xmx23g
    sed -i 's/\t/,/g' HHCHN_length_distribution.csv
fi

miseq_library.flank_seq_3P.commandLine:
python /usr/src/python/grna_analysis/generate_flank_fasta.py -f TGAAGCTACAGGACT -i "three_prime" 1>&2

FLANK_LENGTH=$(echo "TGAAGCTACAGGACT" | tr -d " \n" | wc -c)
ADJUSTED_FLANK_LENGTH=$(($FLANK_LENGTH > 31 ? 31 : $FLANK_LENGTH))
echo $ADJUSTED_FLANK_LENGTH

miseq_library.flank_seq_5P.commandLine:
python /usr/src/python/grna_analysis/generate_flank_fasta.py -f GTGCGTATGTTTGTA -i "five_prime" 1>&2

FLANK_LENGTH=$(echo "GTGCGTATGTTTGTA" | tr -d " \n" | wc -c)
ADJUSTED_FLANK_LENGTH=$(($FLANK_LENGTH > 31 ? 31 : $FLANK_LENGTH))
echo $ADJUSTED_FLANK_LENGTH

miseq_library.seal.commandLine:
echo using length5PFlank: 15
echo using length3PFlank: 15

## filter by 5' (forward and rev-comp)
echo filtering by 5 prime forward and rev-comp
seal.sh in=/global/cscratch1/sd/jaws_jtm/jaws-prod/cromwell-executions/miseq_libraries/5c7ca4aa-6bc2-4f90-a80c-6232ee64e1f0/call-miseq_library/shard-0/miseq_library.miseq_library/2fb7bb1a-3dce-4f93-82c2-c956d2c27a57/call-seal/inputs/-431562307/HHCHN_merged.fastq  mm=f rcomp=f pattern=out_%.fq  k=15 ref=/global/cscratch1/sd/jaws_jtm/jaws-prod/cromwell-executions/miseq_libraries/5c7ca4aa-6bc2-4f90-a80c-6232ee64e1f0/call-miseq_library/shard-0/miseq_library.miseq_library/2fb7bb1a-3dce-4f93-82c2-c956d2c27a57/call-seal/inputs/-249615313/five_prime_flanks.fasta #-Xmx23g

## filter by 3' (forward)
if [ -f ./out_five_prime_flank.fq ]
then
    echo filtering by 3 prime forward
    seal.sh in=./out_five_prime_flank.fq  mm=f rcomp=f pattern=out_%.fq k=15 ref=/global/cscratch1/sd/jaws_jtm/jaws-prod/cromwell-executions/miseq_libraries/5c7ca4aa-6bc2-4f90-a80c-6232ee64e1f0/call-miseq_library/shard-0/miseq_library.miseq_library/2fb7bb1a-3dce-4f93-82c2-c956d2c27a57/call-seal/inputs/-507780751/three_prime_flank.fasta #-Xmx23g
else
    echo not filtering by 3 prime forward
fi

## filter by 3' (revcomp)
if [ -f ./out_five_prime_flank_revcomp.fq ]
then
    echo filtering by 3 prime rev-comp
    seal.sh in=./out_five_prime_flank_revcomp.fq  mm=f rcomp=f pattern=out_%.fq k=15 ref=/global/cscratch1/sd/jaws_jtm/jaws-prod/cromwell-executions/miseq_libraries/5c7ca4aa-6bc2-4f90-a80c-6232ee64e1f0/call-miseq_library/shard-0/miseq_library.miseq_library/2fb7bb1a-3dce-4f93-82c2-c956d2c27a57/call-seal/inputs/-507780751/three_prime_revcomp_flank.fasta #-Xmx23g
else
    echo not filtering by 3 prime rev-comp
fi

imports.generate_miseq_html.wdl:
workflow generate_miseq_html {

    String analysisName
    Array[File] pngPlots
    Array[File] lengthDistributionCsvs
    Array[File] statsCsvs
    File? excelWorkbook

    call generate_html {
        input:
            analysisName=analysisName,
            pngPlots=pngPlots,
            lengthDistributionCsvs=lengthDistributionCsvs,
            statsCsvs=statsCsvs,
            excelWorkbook=excelWorkbook
    }

    output {
        File summaryZip = generate_html.summaryZip
    }
}


task generate_html {

    String analysisName
    Array[File] pngPlots
    Array[File] lengthDistributionCsvs
    Array[File] statsCsvs
    File? excelWorkbook

    command {
        mkdir -p summary/"${analysisName}"
        HTML_DIR=$(realpath summary/"${analysisName}")

        mkdir data
        DATA_DIR=$(realpath data)

        for FILE in ${sep=' ' pngPlots}
        do
            cp $FILE data
        done

        for FILE in ${sep=' ' lengthDistributionCsvs}
        do
            cp $FILE data
        done

        for FILE in ${sep=' ' statsCsvs}
        do
            cp $FILE data
        done

        cd "$HTML_DIR"  # generate index.html here

        if [ -r "${excelWorkbook}" ]
        then
            python /usr/src/python/grna_analysis/generate_html.py -n ${analysisName} -d "$DATA_DIR" -e "${excelWorkbook}"
        else
            python /usr/src/python/grna_analysis/generate_html.py -n ${analysisName} -d "$DATA_DIR"
        fi

        # zip up the HTML dir
        cd .. # cd to summary dir
        tar -czvf "${analysisName}".tar.gz "${analysisName}"
    }

    output {
        File summaryZip="summary/${analysisName}.tar.gz"
    }

    runtime {
        docker: "doejgi/synbioqc-libqc:0.2.2"
        poolname: "synbio_small"
        shared: 0
        node: 1
        nwpn: 5
        memory: "116G"
        time: "06:00:00"
    }
}

submittedFiles.workflow:
import "miseq_library.wdl" as miseq_library
import "visualize_miseq_library.wdl" as visualize_miseq_library
import "generate_miseq_html.wdl" as generate_miseq_html
import "generate_miseq_excel.wdl" as generate_miseq_excel

workflow miseq_libraries {

    String analysisName

    # TSV file has three columns:
    # library_name, 5P flank, 3P flank.
    File libraryFlanksTsv

    # keys of these maps are the library names in the first column of libraryFlanksTsv
    Map[String, File] libNameFastq
    Map[String, File] libNameReferencesFasta

    scatter (libFlanks in read_tsv(libraryFlanksTsv)) {
        String libName = libFlanks[0]
        String flank5P = libFlanks[1]
        String flank3P = libFlanks[2]

        call miseq_library.miseq_library {
            input:
                libName=libName,
                libFastq=libNameFastq[libName],
                referencesFasta=libNameReferencesFasta[libName],
                flankSeq5P=flank5P,
                flankSeq3P=flank3P
        }
        if (defined(miseq_library.statsPythonCsv) && defined(miseq_library.lengthDistributionCsv)) {
            call visualize_miseq_library.visualize_miseq_library as vis_python_stats {
                input:
                    libName=libName,
                    lengthDistributionCsv=miseq_library.lengthDistributionCsv,
                    statsCsv=miseq_library.statsPythonCsv
            }
        }
        if (defined(miseq_library.statsSealCsv) && defined(miseq_library.lengthDistributionCsv)) {
            call visualize_miseq_library.visualize_miseq_library as vis_seal_stats {
                input:
                    libName=libName,
                    lengthDistributionCsv=miseq_library.lengthDistributionCsv,
                    statsCsv=miseq_library.statsSealCsv
            }
        }
    }
    call collect_outputs {
        input:
            visPythonLengthDistributionPngs=vis_python_stats.lengthDistributionPng,
            visPythonSpacersDistributionPngs=vis_python_stats.spacersDistributionPng,
            visSealLengthDistributionPngs=vis_seal_stats.lengthDistributionPng,
            visSealSpacersDistributionPngs=vis_seal_stats.spacersDistributionPng,
            statsPythonsCsvs=miseq_library.statsPythonCsv,
            statsSealCsvs=miseq_library.statsSealCsv,
            lengthDistributionCsvs=miseq_library.lengthDistributionCsv
    }

    call generate_miseq_excel.generate_excel {
        input:
            analysisName=analysisName,
            lengthDistributionCsvs=collect_outputs.distributionCsvs,
            statsCsvs=collect_outputs.statsCsvs
    }

    call generate_miseq_html.generate_html {
        input:
            analysisName=analysisName,
            pngPlots=collect_outputs.pngPlots,
            lengthDistributionCsvs=collect_outputs.distributionCsvs,
            statsCsvs=collect_outputs.statsCsvs,
            excelWorkbook=generate_excel.excelWorkbook
    }

    output {
        File summaryZip=generate_html.summaryZip
        File excelWorkbook = generate_excel.excelWorkbook
    }

}
task collect_outputs {

    Array[File?] visPythonLengthDistributionPngs
    Array[File?] visPythonSpacersDistributionPngs

    Array[File?] visSealLengthDistributionPngs
    Array[File?] visSealSpacersDistributionPngs

    Array[File?] statsPythonsCsvs
    Array[File?] statsSealCsvs

    Array[File?] lengthDistributionCsvs

    command {
        mkdir plots
        mkdir stats
        mkdir distributions
        
        for FILE in ${sep=' ' visPythonLengthDistributionPngs}
        do
            cp $FILE plots
        done

        for FILE in ${sep=' ' visPythonSpacersDistributionPngs}
        do
            cp $FILE plots
        done

        for FILE in ${sep=' ' visSealLengthDistributionPngs}
        do
            cp $FILE plots
        done

        for FILE in ${sep=' ' visSealSpacersDistributionPngs}
        do
            cp $FILE plots
        done

        for FILE in ${sep=' ' statsPythonsCsvs}
        do
            cp $FILE stats
        done

        for FILE in ${sep=' ' statsSealCsvs}
        do
            cp $FILE stats
        done

        for FILE in ${sep=' ' lengthDistributionCsvs}
        do
            cp $FILE distributions
        done
    }

    output {
        Array[File] pngPlots=glob('plots/*.png')
        Array[File] statsCsvs=glob('stats/*.csv')
        Array[File] distributionCsvs=glob('distributions/*.csv')
    }

    runtime {
        docker: "doejgi/synbioqc-libqc:0.2.2"
        poolname: "synbio_small"
        shared: 0
        node: 1
        nwpn: 5
        memory: "116G"
        time: "06:00:00"
    }

}
